result.arabic_text: خَتَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَعَلَىٰ سَمۡعِهِمۡۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ غِشَٰوَةٞۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
result.translation: Allah has sealed their hearts and their hearing, and their sight is covered[6]; and for them there will be a great punishment.
result.footnotes: [6] A covering preventing from discerning guidance, as a result of their arrogance and persistence in sin.
